data.name: Planet Finance
data.description:
What Is Planet Finance (AQUA)?

Planet Finance is an interplanetary financial ecosystem governed by AQUA, built on Binance Smart Chain. Planet Finance combines the best DeFi apps all in one place at the apex of high yields and low risk. The Blue Planet’s goal is to be the best stablecoin yield aggregator on Binance Smart Chain. The Red Planet aims to be the best cryptocurrency aggregator in all of defi. The Green Planet releases next and will be a real-time lending & borrowing platform.


AQUA is the native utility token that is used for:

* Used to receive fees earned from the protocol.
* Purchasing NFTs on the platform
* Used for governance votes to determine how Planet Finance evolves & improves.


How Many AQUA Tokens Are There in Circulation?

Planet Finance launched on May 2nd, 2021 starting with 0 tokens. Each day 500 tokens are minted and earned by users of the protocol. There are ZERO tokens allocated to the team. AQUA had a community first fair-launch distribution where anyone can earn AQUA by placing funds in vaults. 40% of profit fees are used to buy & burn AQUA making it deflationary from day 1 & beyond.


Who Are the Founders of Planet Finance?

Planet Finance is founded by an anonymous team, spanning across 4 countries that have been in blockchain since 2012. 

Planet Finance was conceptualized in 2020 in an effort to create a product combining the best elements & opportunities of decentralized finance into one place.


Where Can I Buy AQUA (AQUA)?

AQUA is currently available to buy on PancakeSwap and will soon have its own liquidity pools on Planet Finance.

https://exchange.pancakeswap.finance/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x72b7d61e8fc8cf971960dd9cfa59b8c829d91991

It can be purchased using BNB or any tokens listed within the AMM and will soon be on an expanding number of other exchanges.
What Makes Planet Finance Unique?

Planet Finance is the best DeFi apps all in one place at the apex of high yields and low risk. Vaults on Planet Finance create a way for anyone to be able to passively earn on their monetary energy.

Within a single click, you’ll be able to access the best opportunities in yield generation, lending, token swaps & more.

Planet Finance Apps:
- Blue Planet: Super-optimized stablecoin yields
- Red Planet: Super-optimized yields on the best cryptocurrencies
- Uranus: Super-optimized yields on your favorite altcoins
- Green Planet: An incentivized Lending & Borrowing Platform

With more planets to be discovered…

Related Pages:
Learn more about Planet Finance: https://planetfinance.io/

Learn more about AQUA: https://docs.planetfinance.io/tokenomics/aqua
